verses.name: Mark 4:33
verses.text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them, as they were able to hear it.

verses.name: Mark 4:34
verses.text: But without a parable spake he not unto them: and when they were alone, he expounded all things to his disciples.

verses.name: Mark 4:35
verses.text: And the same day, when the even was come, he saith unto them, Let us pass over unto the other side.

verses.name: Mark 4:36
verses.text: And when they had sent away the multitude, they took him even as he was in the ship. And there were also with him other little ships.
